dcterms:creator: Tannon Kew
Marek Kostrzewa
Sarah Ebling
dcterms:description: The 20 Minuten dataset is based on articles from one of the most widely circulated German-language newspapers in Switzerland, featuring short articles that cover a variety of topics, often including summaries and topic tags.
dcterms:title: 20 Minuten dataset

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: The SNLI dataset is a large annotated corpus designed for learning natural language inference, containing sentence pairs labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutrality.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel Bowman
dcterms:description: The MultiNLI dataset is a broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, containing sentence pairs from various genres labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutrality.
dcterms:title: MultiNLI

dcterms:creator: Tannon Kew
Marek Kostrzewa
Sarah Ebling
dcterms:description: The Swissdox@LiRI database contains over 1.5 million Swiss news articles in German, French, Italian, and Romansh, used for fine-tuning the SwissBERT model.
dcterms:title: Swissdox@LiRI database
